arm_group.description: Each lung cancer patient with organ failure, admitted in emergency, thoracic oncology or directly in ICU

brief_summary.textblock:
Investigators will evaluate determinants of the patients' care type : palliative, medical or
      intensive care. The place of patient or family on care's decision will be noticed.
      Investigators will evaluate 3 month-survival and patients' feelings (visit with a
      psychologist) according to type of care they benefited.

clinical_study.brief_title: Determinants of Intensity of Care of Lung Cancer Patients With Organ Failure

detailed_description.textblock:
Two hundred patients have to be enrolled in 2 years in the Grenoble Teaching Hospital and in
      the Saint Louis hospital in Paris between November 2010 and November 2012. Each lung cancer
      patient with at least one organ failure, admitted in emergency, thoracic oncology or
      directly in ICU will be included.

      The objectives are to identify patients' characteristics associated with proposition for
      intensive care unit admission and those associated with the decision of intensive care unit
      admission.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  lung cancer

          -  Organ failure

        Exclusion Criteria:

        -

study_pop.textblock:
Each lung cancer patient with organ failure, admitted in emergency, thoracic oncology or
        directly in ICU will be included

clinical_study.official_title: Determinants of Intensity of Care of Lung Cancer Patients With Organ Failure

other_outcome.measure: identify patients' characteristics associated with survival
other_outcome.time_frame: up to 4 months after the last inclusion

other_outcome.description: hospital anxiety and depression scale, SF-36 scale and Impact of Event Scale-R and a visit with a psychologist
other_outcome.measure: patients' feelings according to intensity of care they received

authority: France: The Commission nationale de l’informatique et des libertés

primary_outcome.measure: Identify an association between patients' characteristics and proposition for intensive care unit admission.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Identify an association between patients' characteristics and decision of intensive care unit admission among patients proposed for ICU admission

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
